attributes.action: Vaccinate Keyworkers e.g Supermarket Staff, Bus Drivers..
attributes.additional_details: The government should be protecting all that have been risking infection day in day out outside of a medical background. We all matter.
attributes.background: The government need to take into account that Bus Drivers, Supermarket Staff and more keyworkers have been putting their own health and families at risk working during the pandemic. They deserve to be protected to and have been forgotten about. We come into contact with more people than anyone.
